msg.msgText:
An "OAuthProfile" composite object can be updated by using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update OAuthProfile help imaserver update OAuthProfile "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update OAuthProfile "Name=TestOAuthProfile" "ResourceURL=https://192.0.2.1:9444/MessageSightOAuth/Home.jsp" "AuthKey=access_token" "UserInfoURL=https://192.0.2.1:9444/MessageSightOAuth/UserInfo.jsp" "UserInfoKey=username"
Configuration items for the "OAuthProfile" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command help.
